generated_question.question: Rank the top 5 clubs by most UEFA Champions League/European Cup semifinal appearances (all-time).

verification_search_iter0.query: most European Cup/UEFA Champions League semi-final appearances by club UEFA

sources_found.title: Champions League Clubs Most Semi Finals Appearances | StatMuse
Most Semi-Final appearances by clubs in UEFA Champions League ...
5 clubs with the most Champions League semi-final appearances
Most semi-finals reached in UEFA competitions by club : r/soccer
Countries with most teams in Champions League semi-finals

cross_check_iter0.reason: The provided sources do not give a complete, authoritative top‑5 ranking of clubs by all‑time UEFA Champions League/European Cup semifinal appearances. The StatMuse page only shows the top three (Real Madrid first, Bayern second, Barcelona third) and lists implausible counts (e.g., Real Madrid 67), casting doubt on its reliability. The Facebook post cites Champions League‑era numbers only (Real Madrid 17, Bayern 13), not including European Cup semis, and is not an authoritative source. The AllFootball and Reddit links do not provide a definitive club ranking specific to CL/European Cup semis, and the FourFourTwo article discusses countries and gives isolated club counts (e.g., Benfica eight) without a full ranking. Because the sources are partial, inconsistent, or not directly relevant, the proposed top‑5 order cannot be verified or corrected from the given data.

verification_search_iter1.query: Rank the top 5 clubs by most UEFA Champions League/European Cup semifinal appearances (all-time). Real Madrid Bayern Munich ranking

sources_found.title: All-time Clubs - Most appearances Stats | UEFA Champions League
SEVEN clubs with Most Semi-Final appearances in Champions ...
How many times have Real Madrid and Bayern Munich reached the ...
European Cup and UEFA Champions League records and statistics
Champions League semi-final records and statistics - UEFA.com

cross_check_iter1.reason: UEFA’s semi-final records page lists club totals by country, confirming Real Madrid (33) and Barcelona (17) among Spain, AC Milan (13) and Juventus (12) among Italy, and Liverpool (12) and Manchester United (12) among England. AS.com explicitly ranks the top clubs by semi-final appearances with Real Madrid first (33) and Bayern Munich second (21), consistent with UEFA’s figures and placing Barcelona third and AC Milan fourth. The fifth-highest total is 12, shared by Liverpool, Manchester United, and Juventus; choosing Liverpool for 5th is acceptable within that tie. The proposed order (Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Barcelona, AC Milan, Liverpool) matches the authoritative data in ranking and order. Sources: UEFA.com semi-final records and statistics (https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/news/0251-0e98b6087305-3465998b7606-1000--champions-league-semi-final-records-and-statistics/), AS.com (https://en.as.com/soccer/how-many-times-have-real-madrid-and-bayern-munich-reached-the-champions-league-semi-finals-n/)

Winter Olympic Medals by Country, 1924-2022 | Animated Maps
All-Time Medal Tally For The Winter Olympics [2022 Update]
Who has the most Olympic medals of all time? These countries and ...

cross_check_iter0.reason: The Allcompetitions all-time Winter Olympics medal table (1924–2022) lists gold counts by country and shows: Norway with the most golds (148), United States second (113), Germany (GER entry) third (104), Soviet Union fourth (78), and Canada fifth (77). The table treats East Germany (GDR, 39 gold) and West Germany (FRG, 11 gold) as separate NOCs, so the Germany (GER) total is not combined with those, keeping GER below the USA. This matches the proposed answers and their order.
